          <title>
            <string language="en">Making nitric acid</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bilden der Salpetersäure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Préparation de l'acide nitrique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fazendo o ácido nitric</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Preparazione dell'acido nitrico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατασκευή του νιτρικού οξέος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fabricación del ácido nítrico</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows how some ammonia from the Haber process is changed into nitric acid.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, wie etwas Ammoniak vom 
Haber Prozeß in Salpetersäure geändert wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre comment de l'ammoniaque du 
processus de Haber est changée en acide nitrique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra como alguma amônia do 
processo de Haber é mudada no ácido nitric.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra come una certa ammoniaca dal
processo di Haber è cambiata in acido nitrico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επιδεικνύει πώς κάποια αμμωνία 
από τη διαδικασία Haber αλλάζουν στο νιτρικό οξύ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra cómo un poco de amoníaco 
del proceso de Haber se cambia en el ácido nítrico.</string>
          </description>
